Photos by Lennart Ootes!

Ding, Liren (2836) - Vidit, Santosh Gujrathi (2639) 0-1
Chess Super League 2021 (Chess.com) [03] 2021.10.13
A45 Queen's pawn game

1.d4 Nf6 2.Bf4 d5 3.e3 c5 4.dxc5 Qa5+ 5.Nc3 Qxc5 6.Nb5 Na6 7.c3 Bd7 8.a4 e6 9.Nf3 Be7 10.Be2 O-O 11.O-O Qb6 12.Qd4 Bc5 13.Qd3 Rfc8 14.b4 Be7 15.Rfc1 Qd8 16.Qd4 Qb6 17.Be5 Be8 18.h3 h6 19.Qxb6 axb6 20.Bd4 Nd7 21.Bd3 f6 22.e4 e5 23.Be3 f5 24.exd5 e4 25.d6 Bf6 26.Be2 exf3 27.Bxf3 Rab8 28.a5 bxa5 29.Rxa5 Ne5 30.Bd5+ Bf7 31.Bxf7+ Kxf7 32.d7 Rd8 33.Nd6+ Ke6 34.Nxb7 Rxb7 35.Rxa6+ Kf7 36.c4 Rxb4 37.c5 Rxd7 38.c6 Rc7 39.Ra7 Bd8 40.Rca1 Ke6 41.Ra8 Nxc6 42.Rc1 Bf6 43.Ra6 Kd7 44.Rd1+ Ke8 45.Rc1 Nb8 46.Re6+ Kd7 47.Rxc7+ Kxe6

Six teams (with six players each) compete this week in a single round-robin followed by a knockout phase on Saturday and Sunday. All squads happen to have their own musical songs, resonating names, and dedicated team logos, adding to the experience.

The teams form an interesting mix of ages and nationalities. There are six top grandmasters (male and female), six top players from India (male and female), and six top Indian juniors (boys and girls). Each round sees three team matches played after each other for maximum exposure and coverage.uschesschamps.com
